original_text: Pilate decided to do what the crowd wanted. So he let Barabbas go free. He said to his soldiers, ‘Hit Jesus many times with a whip. Then take him and fix him on a cross to die.’
korean_text: 빌라도가 무리에게 만족을 주고자 하여 바라바는 놓아 주고 예수는 채찍질하고 십자가에 못 박히게 넘겨 주니라

sentences.original_text: Pilate decided to do what the crowd wanted
sentences.korean_translation: 빌라도는 무리가 원하는 것을 하기로 결정했습니다

sentences.original_text: So he let Barabbas go free
Hit Jesus many times with a whip
and fix him on a cross to die
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 십자가에 그를 못박아 죽게 하세요
